mdx.excerpt: There’s no such thing as magic. Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic  — Arthur C. Clarke’s Third Law

frontmatter.title: Wizards and Witches Were Scientists
frontmatter.description: There’s no such thing as magic.
